title: Dziewczyna i kosmonauta
overview: It takes place on two time planes: in 2023 and 2053. The main characters in the production are two F-16 pilots, Bogdan and Nikodem. Men compete for the heart of beautiful Marta and the opportunity to fly into space. Niko wins the professional competition, but as a result of a breakdown, his ship disappears from the radars and returns only after 30 years. Interestingly, the man has not even aged one day and wants to get Marta back. The world, however, is more interested in the secret of his youth.
